author: Daniel Greene
description:
This week: the Fourth Wing adaptation is back with a new showrunner, the Neuromancer trailer drops, and Patrick Rothfuss is the center of a reddit conspiracy. Plus, new deluxe editions for The Hobbit and Assassin’s Apprentice, Dune 3 begins filming, Dungeon Crawler Carl gets a webtoon, and AI voice hit a... snag.
